title: Syncros one-piece carbon Silverton SL wheels go wide & lighter! 30mm internal for Nino & Kate
content:
Remember those crazy light one-piece carbon Syncros Silverton SL wheels with carbon rim, spokes & hubs – all molded together at one time? Well, Syncros has a new version with a wider 30mm internal rim, and they will be racing the XC World Cup under multi-time World, World Cup & National champions Nino Schurter, Kate […]

The post Syncros one-piece carbon Silverton SL wheels go wide & lighter! 30mm internal for Nino & Kate appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
